title: Autonomous Surveillance Drone
description: An autonomous quadcopter developed for real-time aerial surveillance and obstacle avoidance using computer vision and waypoint navigation.

title: 6-DOF Industrial Robotic Arm
description: A six-degree-of-freedom robotic arm designed for precision pick-and-place operations with focus on kinematics and motion planning.

title: AI Vision Sorting System
description: An AI-powered vision system that classifies and sorts objects on a conveyor belt using deep learning models.
